titles.title: To designate the western breakwater for the project for navigation, New Haven Harbor, Connecticut, as the "Charles Hervey Townshend Breakwater".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 9/10/2001--Introduced. Designates the western breakwater for the project for navigation, New Haven Harbor, Connecticut, as the Charles Hervey Townshend Breakwater.
